name: AchievementChecks
_source: if;not has_achievement('25') and {v:TraineeDeployed} == 4 and game.check_alive('Alpin') and game.check_alive('Carlin') and game.check_alive('Shayla') and game.check_alive('Raelin')
update_achievement;25;Beaten By A Buncha Kids;Deployed all trainees in Ch5 and had them survive
update_achievement;26;One Less War Crime;Cleared Ch5 without deploying any trainees
update_achievement;27;Gotoh The Bench;Cleared Ch5 without deploying your Gotoh
update_achievement;29;Merely A Footnote;Cleared Ch5 without killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;30;The Darkest Timeline;Cleared Ch5 after killing Cawthorne
update_achievement;35;Everyone's An Edgelord;Cleared the game without using any supports
update_achievement;38;Instructions Unclear;Got generic visit dialogue for every house
update_achievement;39;All That For Nothing;No playable unit deaths in a playthrough
update_achievement;41;Do Them Dirty;Defeated all lieutenants and Cawthorne in Ch5
if;not has_achievement('44') and {v:CawthorneStg2} == 1 and game.mode.nid == 'Hard' and '{v:ReverseRecruitment}' == 'No'
update_achievement;44;Hardly Trying;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (Hard)
if;not has_achievement('45') and {v:CawthorneStg2} == 1 and game.mode.nid == 'Lunatic' and '{v:ReverseRecruitment}' == 'No'
update_achievement;45;Absolutely Lunatic;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (Lunatic)
if;not has_achievement('46') and {v:CawthorneStg2} == 1 and game.mode.nid == 'Hard' and '{v:ReverseRecruitment}' == 'Yes'
update_achievement;46;Fully Accommodating;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (Hard, RR)
if;not has_achievement('47') and {v:CawthorneStg2} == 1 and game.mode.nid == 'Lunatic' and '{v:ReverseRecruitment}' == 'Yes'
update_achievement;47;Relatively Sane;Trigger Cawthorne's 2nd stage and survive (Lunatic, RR)
